item.title: Welcome to the Fireside
item.description: Fireside a series of articles that I’m writing to consolidate my learning. I have always dreamed of blogging. I have even tried once called 20MinuteRants. They worked quite well as a basic format whereby I can write about things in a fairly efficient manner (hence the 20 minutes), and be able to reflect about the things I’m up to. The problem with the project is that I rarely had the motivation to do one.
